title: Georgia's new president is inaugurated, complicating country's path to joining EU
snippet: In his speech Sunday, Kavelashvili promised to be “everyone’s president, regardless of whether they like me or not.” He called for the nation to unite behind him around “shared values, the principles of mutual respect, and the future we should build together.” · Georgian Dream retained control of Parliament in the South Caucasus nation in an Oct.

title: The Bitter Standoff Over Georgia's Next President
snippet: An electoral college is expected to choose Mikheil Kavelashvili, a 53-year-old former footballer and right-wing populist, as Georgia's next president. But with the country rocked by anti-government protests, the incumbent Salome Zurabishvili ...

title: DOJ sues Georgia county as Trump pushes debunked 2020 election fraud claims - The Washington Post
snippet: President Donald Trump has increasingly pressured his administration to find widespread voter fraud in the 2020 election, despite those claims having been debunked and dismissed in dozens of cases by the courts.

title: Salomé Zourabichvili - Wikipedia
snippet: She was quoted saying "This building ... the President, who was legitimate, sat here. I'm taking away the legitimacy, I'm taking away the flag, I'm taking away what is your trust".
